name: National Museum
description: Home to historical artifacts from the Benin Empire.

name: Oba's Palace
description: A UNESCO heritage site and the traditional seat of power.

name: Benin Moat
description: One of the largest man-made earthworks in the world.

name: Igun Street
description: Famous for bronze casting and cultural artistry.

name: Ogba Zoo
description: A natural reserve with various animal species.

name: Benin Mall
description: A modern shopping center with restaurants and cinemas.

name: Edo Heritage Park
description: A venue showcasing Edo culture, food, and performances.

name: Emotan Statue
description: Statue commemorating a brave woman in Benin history.
